heading: HB08587
0: AN ACT RENAMING THE JUNCTION TALUBIN-BARLIG-NATONIN-PARACELIS-CALACCAD ROAD STRETCHING FROM BARANGAY TALUBIN IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BONTOC, BARANGAYS LINGOY, GAWANA (POBLACION), FIANGTIN, LIAS, CHUPAC AND LUNAS IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF BARLIG, BARANGAYS BANAO, TONGLAYAN, UGTONG, ALUNOGAN, STA. ISABEL, POBLACION, BANAWEL AND SALIOK IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF NATONIN AND BARANGAYS POBLACION, BANTAY, BACARRI UP TO CALACCAD ROAD IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF PARACELIS, ALL IN THE PROVINCE OF MOUNTAIN PROVINCE, AS REP. MAXIMO B. DALOG ROAD
short-title:
Renaming The Junction Talubin- Barlig- Natonin- 
 Paracelis- Calaccad Road Stretching From Barangay Talubin In The Municipality Of Bontoc, Barangays Lingoy, Gawana ( Poblacion), Fiangtin, Lias, Chupac And Lunas In The Municipality Of Barlig, Barangays Banao, Tonglayan, Ugtong, Alunogan, Sta. Isabel, Poblacion, Banawel And Saliok In The Municipality Of Natonin And Barangays Poblacion, Bantay, Bacarri Up To Calaccad Road In The Municipality Of Paracelis, All In The Province Of Mountain Province, As Rep. Maximo B. Dalog Road
